entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
